mapper.delete: delete from follow where u_id = #{u_id} and f_passiveUser = #{f_passiveUser}
mapper.select: select u.u_id as follower, u.u_nick, i.u_path, i.u_image, (select count(*) from follow f1 where f1.f_passiveUser = follower) as followerCount from user u inner join u_imgupload i on i.u_id = u.u_id where u.u_id in (select f_passiveUser from follow f where f.u_id = #{u_id}) order by u.u_nick
